Lighthouse Resources

Below is a list of guides, written by CCASN, for developing college and career pathways, including Master Schedule and Leadership Guides.

Internship Handbook for Career Academies

This guide has many adaptable forms to use in your internship program and advice for setting up or improving your internship program.

Partnership Guide for Career Academies

If you are a new coordinator or an academy lead, this guide is for you. The guide covers the following: Employer/Higher Education Support; Academy Advisory Boards; Nine Principals for Sustaining Partner Support; Speakers and Field Trips; Job Shadowing, Mentorships, and Internships; and 15 Steps to Building and Maintaining a Large Partner Base for a Career Academy.

Mentoring Guide for Career Academies

This guide is written for Academy Coordinators and Mentors alike and discusses everything from policies and funding to recruitment and training.

Curriculum Resources

University of California A-G Portal

This site is searchable for courses from other CPA’s that can be adopted by your program.

CTE Online

This site has lesson plans, projects, units, and course outlines categorized by pathways

University of California Curriculum Integration

Teacher-designed courses that integrate academic work with CTE.
